title: TikTok goes dark in the US
author: mfiguiere
aiHeadline: Breaking News: TikTok Takes a Temporary Timeout in the US, Leaving Users to Twiddle Their Thumbs and Wonder if They'll Ever Get Their Daily Dose of Dance Challenges and Cat Videos Again, But Don't Worry, It's Back Up Now, So You Can Breathe a Sigh of Relief and Get Back to Scrolling Mindlessly

title: TikTok says it is restoring service for U.S. users
author: Leary
aiHeadline: TikTok's Brief Blackout in the US is Over, and the Company is Breathing a Sigh of Relief as Service is Restored, But Let's Be Real, We All Know It's Only a Matter of Time Before the Next Outage, Because, You Know, Technology is Always a Delicate Flower That Can Wiltingly Wither Away at Any Moment

title: Forgejo: A self-hosted lightweight software forge
author: thunderbong
aiHeadline: Introducing Forgejo, the Self-Hosted Lightweight Software Forge That's Here to Save the Day, or at Least Your Sanity, by Giving You a Refreshing Alternative to the Usual Soul-Sucking,Corporate-Controlled Options, So Go Ahead, Take a Deep Breath, and Join the Rebellion Against the Walled Gardens of the Tech World

title: Escape the walled garden and algorithm black boxes with RSS feeds
author: rekl
aiHeadline: Warning: RSS Feeds May Cause Excessive Freedom and Autonomy, So Proceed with Caution, But If You're Tired of Being Held Hostage by Algorithmic Black Boxes and Walled Gardens, Then It's Time to Break Free and Join the RSS Revolution, Where You Get to Choose What You See and When, What a Novel Concept, Right?

title: Haskell: A Great Procedural Language
author: kqr
aiHeadline: Haskell, the Programming Language That's So Pure and Functional, It'll Make You Wonder How You Ever Lived Without It, But Don't Just Take Our Word for It, Read This Article and Discover Why Haskell is the Unsung Hero of Procedural Programming, and How It'll Make You a Better, More Enlightened Coder, or at Least Give You a Good Laugh
